page.title: 17AREA HEALTH AUTHORITY
page.content: North East Essex Area Health Authority owns a large proportion of the land between Turner Road and Mile End Road.Turner Village Hospital which caters for the mentally handicapped has extensive grounds. The new District General Hospital has recently been built on part of this land. This hospital which has an Accident and Emergency Department was opened by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II on the 17th May 1985, many children went to welcome the Queen when she came to Colchester. A further second phase of the hospital is due to be built in the coming years.
